## Art Direction Prompt

```
The background features a converted 17th-century monastery perched on rugged cliffs overlooking the deep blue Tyrrhenian Sea. The golden hour light bathes the scene in warm hues, casting long shadows and highlighting the textured stone walls adorned with creeping bougainvillea vines. A winding stone path leads up to the entrance of the monastery, framed by lush lemon groves that contrast with their bittersweet yellow fruit against the deep blue sky. The sea below sparkles like polished sapphire, reflecting subtle hues from the setting sun.

The dominant focal point is a terracotta-roofed balcony near the top of the monastery, where delicate bougainvillea blooms spill over the edge. Light and shadow create an intimate mood, with soft focus blurring distant details while sharpening the textures of rough stone walls and cool linen drapes visible through open windows. The color palette is rich in terracotta and white stone, deep blue sea, lemon yellow foliage, and purplish bougainvillea flowers.

Distant church bells ring softly, mingling with the rhythmic sound of waves crashing against rocky shores below. The atmosphere is serene yet charged with emotional undertones, hinting at deep personal journeys and transformative experiences awaiting within the monastery walls.

Style: warm golden light, soft focus, romantic atmosphere, intimate mood, bokeh, sunset tones, dreamy, soft color palette. No text, no words, no lettering.
```
